BR_text.BRsummary: use try and except block around StopIteration or avoid StopIteration completely
BR_text.BRdescription:
is deprecated from python3.6+, <denchmark-link:https://docs.python.org/3.6/whatsnew/3.6.html#deprecated-python-behavior>https://docs.python.org/3.6/whatsnew/3.6.html#deprecated-python-behavior</denchmark-link>
 
 As per <denchmark-link:https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0479/>https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0479/</denchmark-link>
  we should not use  on generators.
 See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/issues/636>#636</denchmark-link>
